elements.textContent:
“The Department of Interior has committed to a unified monitoring and data management effort that will promote state of the art data integration procedures to facilitate data sharing.”

- Interior’s Plan for a Coordinated, Science-based Response to Climate Change Impacts on our Land, Water, and Wildlife Resources

The technology exists
We know how to do this – several DOI efforts already underway
Lots of other agencies, universities, NGOs, industry contributing
Congress and OMB want to eliminate redundancy and see true interagency collaboration … the DOI could be a national leader if we got our data integration act together
